extension.description: [COLOR red][B][I]KOBRA[/I][/B][/COLOR][COLOR grey] [B]APP INSTALLER[/B][/COLOR]. Browse through the most popular Android apps on the market and install them with ease from within Kodi. The author of this addon takes no responsibilty for any content viewed via these applications or any damage caused by use of of these applications. Big thanks to ][NT3L][G3NC][.
